title: Make Ingest Request
name: Make_Ingest_Request
description: Allows you to ingest a new video into the Once system

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
TThe id for the digital media catalog for your domain

Request Body Fields.description: The title of the asset (max length: 255 characters)
The unique identifier for the asset (max length: 255 characters)
A description of the asset
Array of keyword strings associated with the video
A map of key value pairs for Extended Metadata
The key of an Extended Metadata key value pair (see the example below for key/value pairs)
Container for the source URL of the asset being ingested
The URL string to the source asset
An array of Publication Rules for the asset
The Channel Guid for the Publication Rule
The start date for the Publication Rule (epoch time in seconds)
The end date for the Publication Rule (epoch time in seconds)
An array of Client Filters for the Publication Rule
The variable name that the Client Filter will key off of
The value name that the Client Filter will key off of
The type of filtering used to compare the value
Denotes whether a successful comparison of the Client Filter is denied or allowed
An array of Country Rules for the asset
The Country Code for the Country Rule (ISO 639 2-letter code, such as "CA")
Denotes whether a successful comparison of the Client Filter is denied or allowed
An array of Cue Points for the asset
The time in which the Cue Point will be inserted (integer)
The type of unit the time value
An array of Timed Text items for the asset
Container for the source URL of the timed text file being ingested
The URL string to the source asset
The type to categorize the timed text item
An array of languages contained in the timed text asset (ISO-639 language codes)
The optional id to associate with the timed text item, used as a descriptor or to create uniqueness
An array of Notifications to be fired during ingest
The HTTP endpoint or sns target for your notification
The type of notification to be associated with, defaults to publish

examples.title: Ingest Request Body Example:

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct
Errors 404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested

examples.title: 400 Error Response

title: Add Catalog Rendition
name: Add_Catalog_Rendition
description: Adds the selected rendition as indicated by the rendition_id to the catalog.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
The catalog id
The rendition id

Request Body Fields.description: a rendition id to add

examples.title: Replace Catalog Rendition Request Body Example:

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Create Catalog
name: Create_Catalog
description: Returns a collection of the transcode renditions available to the domain

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account

Request Body Fields.description: Name for the catalog
A collection of rendition_ids to be defined. If excluded, the catalog will acquire the defaulted domain renditions
id of the rendition to include — Only declared if you intent to define a subset of the renditions from the domain

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Delete Catalog Rendition
name: Delete_Catalog_Rendition
description: Deletes rendition as indicated by the rendition_id from the catalog.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
The catalog id
The rendition id to delete

examples.title: Replace Catalog Rendition Request Body Example:

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Get Catalog Information
name: Get_Catalog_Information
description: Returns the essential information of the catalog.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
The catalog id

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Get Catalog List
name: Get_Catalog_List
description: Get a list of catalogs for the domain

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
TThe id for the digital media catalog for your domain

Response Fields.description: URL to get the previous result set (null if there is none)
URL to get the next result set (null if there is none)

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Get Catalog Rendition Settings
name: Get_Catalog_Rendition_Settings
description: Returns a collection of the transcode renditions available to the catalog.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
The catalog id
The rendition id

Response Fields.description: The frame width for the rendition in pixels
The frame height for the rendition in pixels

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Get Catalog Renditions
name: Get_Catalog_Renditions
description: Returns a collection of the transcode renditions available to the catalog.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
The catalog id

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Replace Catalog Renditions
name: Replace_Catalog_Renditions
description: Replaces the currently configured catalog transcode renditions with the set defined in the request body.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
The catalog id
The rendition id

Request Body Fields.description: a rendition id

examples.title: Replace Catalog Rendition Request Body Example:

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Update Catalog Name
name: Update_Catalog_Name
description: Updates the catalog name in the indicated catalogID by setting its catalog_id with the updated name in the request body.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account

Request Body Fields.description: New name for the catalog
The catalog id

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Get Domain
name: Get_Domain
description: Returns a collection of all catalogs within the domain. This method fetches 20 catalogs per page, returns the totalResult to indicate the total number of catalogs and provides previous or next page requests within the body.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Get Domain Renditions
name: Get_Domain_Renditions
description: Returns a collection of the transcode renditions available to the domain

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account

Response Fields.description: Whether this is one of the default Once renditions

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

title: Get Rendition Settings
name: Get_Rendition_Settings
description: Returns a collection of the transcode renditions available to the domain

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
The id for the rendition

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct

The id for the media item

Array of keywords for the media item
unit of the time value for the cue point
time of the cue point in seconds

The optional id to associate with the timed text item, used as a descriptor or to create uniqueness
A map of key value pairs for Extended Metadata
The key of an Extended Metadata key value pair

title: Get Media Item
name: Get_Media_Item

title: Get Media Item Collection
name: Get_Media_Item_Collection
description: Returns a collection of all media items within a catalog. This method fetches 20 media items per page, returns the totalResult to indicate the total number of media items and provides the previous or next page requests within the body.

Path Parameters.description: The domain id for your Once account
TThe id for the digital media catalog for your domain

Response Fields.description: Whether the media item is an ad
URL to get the previous result set (null if there is none)
URL to get the next result set (null if there is none)

Error 4xx.description: 401: Authentication failed; check to make sure your api key is correct
